Question: background
Answer: A shorthand property for setting all the background properties in one declaration

Question: background-attachment
Answer: Sets whether a background image is fixed or scrolls with the rest of the page

Question: background-blend-mode
Answer: Specifies the blending mode of each background layer (color/image)

Question: background-color
Answer: Specifies the background color of an element

Question: background-image
Answer: Specifies one or more background images for an element

Question: background-position
Answer: Specifies the position of a background image

Question: background-repeat
Answer: Sets how a background image will be repeated

Question: background-clip
Answer: Specifies the painting area of the background

Question: background-origin
Answer: Specifies where the background image(s) is/are positioned

Question: background-size
Answer: Specifies the size of the background image(s)

Question: border
Answer: Sets all the border properties in one declaration

Question: border-bottom
Answer: Sets all the bottom border properties in one declaration

Question: border-bottom-color
Answer: Sets the color of the bottom border

Question: border-bottom-left-radius
Answer: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner

Question: border-bottom-right-radius
Answer: Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner

Question: border-bottom-style
Answer: Sets the style of the bottom border

Question: border-bottom-width
Answer: Sets the width of the bottom border

Question: border-color
Answer: Sets the color of the four borders

Question: border-image
Answer: A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties

Question: border-image-outset
Answer: Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box

Question: border-image-repeat
Answer: Specifies whether the border image should be repeated, rounded or stretched

Question: border-image-slice
Answer: Specifies how to slice the border image

Question: border-image-source
Answer: Specifies the path to the image to be used as a border

Question: border-image-width
Answer: Specifies the widths of the image-border

Question: border-left
Answer: Sets all the left border properties in one declaration

Question: border-left-color
Answer: Sets the color of the left border

Question: border-left-style
Answer: Sets the style of the left border

Question: border-left-width
Answer: Sets the width of the left border

Question: border-radius
Answer: A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties

Question: border-right
Answer: Sets all the right border properties in one declaration

Question: border-right-color
Answer: Sets the color of the right border

Question: border-right-style
Answer: Sets the style of the right border

Question: border-right-width
Answer: Sets the width of the right border

Question: border-style
Answer: Sets the style of the four borders

Question: border-top
Answer: Sets all the top border properties in one declaration

Question: border-top-color
Answer: Sets the color of the top border

Question: border-top-left-radius
Answer: Defines the shape of the border of the top-left corner

Question: border-top-right-radius
Answer: Defines the shape of the border of the top-right corner

Question: border-top-style
Answer: Sets the style of the top border

Question: border-top-width
Answer: Sets the width of the top border

Question: border-width
Answer: Sets the width of the four borders

Question: box-decoration-break
Answer: Sets the behaviour of the background and border of an element at page-break, or, for in-line elements, at line-break.

Question: box-shadow
Answer: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box
